TopicTitle: 2 nights ago, I sung in a Lessons & Carols service for my school choir

Articles.Content:
Now that sounds like some ladida BS, but when you have 2 midterms the next day and the service goes from 7:00 to 8:00 with a 45 min reception afterward, it kinda sucks. Also, did I mention that I live 30 minutes away from school? I want to ask you guys a question.

What time do you think I fell asleep?

If you guessed 4:00 AM, You would be correct.

I was so goddamn grumpy yesterday that I almost knocked somebody out cold just for saying that I looked like ****. I'm at an all guys school, so no one cares about the way your uniform looks, and neither do I. So that just tells you how grumpy I was.

Now the midterms.

One of my midterms was for a class of 6 people, so my teacher had us spread around the building because it was a straightforward test. Now this building is 50 years old and infested with bugs and other creepy-crawlies. I saw a weird looking bug and I was just mad at life, so I found a tissue box and grabbed a tissue. I then squeezed the bug so hard the tissue broke.

Yesterday was awful
You think bugs are bad? Are 200+ year old school has a rat infestation...

You think bugs are bad? Are 200+ year old school has a rat infestation...

Over 200?

what.....the....

How....?

Over 200?

what.....the....

How....?

Poor as hell catholic school

but 200 years.....

what is the building made out of?

but 200 years.....

what is the building made out of?

I'm guessing bricks.

-Duxwing
